item.description:
Boston PUG - a meeting for professional photographers

This event is open and free to all...

Worcester based photographer Justin Hammond lands the dream job of shooting the 2013 New England Patriots Cheerleader Calendar. Justin shares with you how he did it and walks you through the process of making the contacts, negotiating the contracts and executing what some say is the best calendar the team has ever produced. Along side Justin is another team member of Flash House Studios, Robert Hare who acted as the Technical Adviser during the calendar shoot. Robert will talk about the location logistics, pre-planing and gear selection for the Jamaica shoot. Together they will share their unique approach on working together on this exciting project and highlighting their own personal accomplishments as portrait photographers. 

https://www.facebook.com/JustinHammondPhoto

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Meet Justin Hammond and Robert Hare
